title: Incense, Atonement, and Anointing Oil
summary: Exodus 30 gives instructions for the altar of incense, the atonement offering (half-shekel tax), the bronze basin for washing, the holy anointing oil, and sacred incenseâ€”all used to set apart the tabernacle and its priests.

faq.question: What was the purpose of the altar of incense?
faq.answer: To burn fragrant incense before the Lord daily as a symbol of prayer and worship.

faq.question: What was the atonement money?
faq.answer: A half-shekel offering each person gave to the Lord as a ransom for their life.
